commit message: Enabled FastScroll to select letters directly.
Positioning scrollbar left in tablet mode.

Add markdown parser library.

See https://github.com/Gunio/MarkdownView

Use markdown parser sourcefiles instead of precompiled jar.

There were some small encoding relevant errors. Fixed it ;)
Git should ignore backup files and personal eclipse settings.

Delete markdown parser library.

Its way to slow. And html is not very 'explorable'.

Add asynchron task class to load data from an url.

In the future, it will also parse json file and save them to an object or
sqlite (or both?).

Use android-async-http library instead of custom classes.

http://loopj.com/android-async-http/

Load list of laws from database.

It works! :)
Clode database connection after updating law data.
Open database in reading mode instead of writing.
Delete all old dummy classes and load detail fragement data from proper db.
Implement callback pattern to load list of laws asynchron.

Pimp the ActionBar!

Use transactions to insert bulk data to database (++speed).

An even faster method to insert data.

Use compiled insert statements with the android.database.DatabaseUtils.InsertHelper
class.
See: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3501516/android-sqlite-database-slow-insertion
